posts.title: Memory Foam Neck Pillow With Hoodie
posts.content: Sleep soundly when you’re travelling on the road or through the skies by bringing along this memory foam neck pillow with hoodie. The soft memory foam cradles your neck while the baggy hood gives you the privacy you need to rest and catch some Z’s.

posts.title: Freezing Pilsner Beer Pint Glass
posts.content: Ensure your favorite brew remains icy cold until the very last drop by chugging it from this freezing pilsner beer pint glass. It features a handy double-walled design that comes filled with a specialized freezable gel that keeps your beverage cold while you drink it.

posts.title: Wireless Parking Sensor
posts.content: Avoid costly fender-benders while you park by outfitting your ride with this wireless parking sensor. It conveniently installs like a license plate frame and alerts you of impending collisions via the included app on your smartphone.

posts.title: LEGO Lamborghini Gallardo
posts.content: Get up close and personal to the car of your dreams by assembling this LEGO Lamborghini Gallardo. This pint sized Lambo captures the essence of the iconic Italian sports car perfectly – from the bright yellow paintjob to the signature rims and emblem.

posts.title: Professional Desktop 3D Printer
posts.content: Turn your computer room into your very own toy factory when you make your own action figures using the professional desktop 3D printer. This innovative printer lets you safely design one of a kind toys and figurines from the comfort of home.

posts.title: Perpetual Calendar
posts.content: Quit throwing your money away on paper calendars once and for all by switching to the perpetual calendar. A series of colorful magnets are placed underneath the durable powder coated steel frame to highlight the day and date in a visually appealing way.

posts.title: Pencil Slingshot
posts.content: Turn your run-of-the-mill writing utensil into the perfect paper ball launching weapon with this pencil slingshot. This metallic clip slips over the pencil’s eraser end to transform it into a tiny yet functional catapult designed for small paper balls.

posts.title: Travel Checklist Pad
posts.content: This travel checklist pad will ensure you’ve got everything packed for your trip before you head out the door. Each page in the pad features an exhaustive  and categorized checklist of everything you could possibly need for your upcoming adventure.

posts.title: Art Of Eating Through The Apocalypse
posts.content: Staying alive will be difficult after the zombies destroy society – luckily the “Art of Eating Through The Apocalypse” book gives you a fighting chance.  After the supermarkets have been depleted, this helpful guide will teach you how to improvise your own meals.

posts.title: Old Book Scented Candle
posts.content: Make your reading nook a little cozier by providing some ambient lighting using this old book scented candle. The candle is made from all natural soy wax and releases a delightful aroma reminiscent of a distinguished library into the air as it burns.

posts.title: Collapsible Shot Flask
posts.content: Keep your buzz going while on the go with the collapsible shot flask. The collapsible shot flask features a metallic collapsible shot cup that fits into the side of the flask, so you can enjoy a nice and easy to swallow pick me up at any time during the day.

posts.title: Smartphone Controlled Battle Bots
posts.content: Settle disputes like a modern gentleman by sending these smartphone controlled battle bots to duel it out for you. These pint-sized high-tech Bluetooth enabled warriors are easy to operate and can be controlled with both Android and iOS devices.
